name: Necrophos
title: Rotund'jere
lore: Necrophos spreads disease and pestilence wherever he goes. His very presence saps the life from enemies.

deathPulse.name: Death Pulse
deathPulse.description: Releases a wave that damages enemies and heals allies.

ghostShroud.name: Ghost Shroud
ghostShroud.description: Necrophos becomes ethereal, slowing himself but gaining increased healing and magic resistance.

hearthstopper.name: Heartstopper Aura
hearthstopper.description: Necrophos's aura damages enemies based on their max HP.

reapersScythe.name: Reaper's Scythe
reapersScythe.description: Stuns a target and deals damage based on how much HP they're missing. Kills add to respawn time.
